short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows detailed RateMyProfessor ratings for professors on web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Professor Rater Pro enhances your course selection experience by providing quick access to professor ratings from RateMyProfessors.com directly on your college's course registration pages.

Currently supported colleges:
- Cosumnes River College
- Sacramento City College
- American River College
- Folsom Lake College

Key features:
- Automatically scans course pages for professor names
- Displays comprehensive professor ratings including overall rating, difficulty, and would take again percentage
- Easy-to-use popup interface for quick access to professor information

This extension helps students make informed decisions about their courses by providing valuable insights about professors' teaching styles, course difficulty, and overall student satisfaction. Install Professor Rater Pro to streamline your course selection process and choose the best professors for your academic journey!


How To Make It Work:

1. Login into eServices page
2. Click - Manage Classes -
3. Click - Class Search and Enroll -
4. Select the Term 
5. Search for the Class 
6. Click on one of the Colleges that pop up (ARC, CRC, SCC, FLC)
7. When on the page with all the different Professors click on the extension and select from the drop down menu the College name and then press on - Scan page for Professors -
8. Wait 5 sec to 10 sec and the information should popup
